```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

ES_ALL_MEDFATE_sf  <- readRDS("../Rdata/ES_MEDFATE.rds")|>
  mutate(id = as.character(as.numeric(substr(id, 1,6))))
ES_ALL_FORMES_sf <- readRDS("../Rdata/ES_FORMES.rds")
ids_formes <- unique(ES_ALL_FORMES_sf$id)
ES_ALL_MEDFATE_sf <- ES_ALL_MEDFATE_sf |>
  filter(id %in% ids_formes)
ES_ALL <- dplyr::bind_rows(ES_ALL_MEDFATE_sf, ES_ALL_FORMES_sf) |>
  sf::st_drop_geometry()
```


```{r, include = FALSE}
table_ES <- function(ES_all, var, outlier = Inf, add_formes = FALSE) {
  ES_sum <- ES_all |>
    filter({{var}} < outlier) |>
    filter(!(Management %in% c("NOG", "NOGEST"))) |>
    mutate(Model = factor(Model, levels = c("MEDFATE", "FORMES")),
           Management = factor(Management, levels = c("BAU", "ASEA", "ACG", "AMF", "RSB"))) |>
    group_by(Climate, Management, Period, MidYear, Model) |>
    summarise(ES = mean({{var}}, na.rm=TRUE), .groups = "drop") |>
    select(-MidYear) |>
    filter(Period %in% unique(ES_ALL$Period)[c(1,3,5)]) |>
    pivot_wider(names_from = c(Climate,Period), names_sort = TRUE, values_from = ES) |>
    arrange(Management,Model) |>
    select(-c("RCP85_2001-2020")) |>
    rename("2001-2020" = "RCP45_2001-2020") 
  if(!add_formes) ES_sum <- ES_sum |>
      filter(Model == "MEDFATE")
  return(ES_sum)
}
```
